nodes.text: Sarb Iltage was an Abednedo criminal active during the time of the New Republic. Iltage was invited by Zeva Bliss of the Spice Runners of Kijimi to a summit on Kijimi, where the Abednedo spoke with the pirate Woan Barso. Bliss intended to have the criminals gathered executed, but Spice Runner Poe Dameron stopped her plans, and the guests had the chance to escape.
